definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Go and buy me some cleese at the dairy.
sentences.chinese: 去乳品店幫我買些奶酷。

sentences.english: The business of owning and operating a dairy or a dairy farm.
sentences.chinese: 乳品業擁有和經營乳品公司或乳牛場的商業。

sentences.english: The business of owning and operating a dairy or a dairy farm.
sentences.chinese: 乳品業擁有和經營乳品公司或乳牛場的商業。

sentences.english: Public health demands that milk and all milk products should be pure and wholesome.
sentences.chinese: 公共衛生要求乳品和所有乳製品應該是純淨衛生的。

sentences.english: During farming rears cattle primarily for milk production.
sentences.chinese: 乳品業飼養的牛主要供生產牛奶。

sentences.english: Dairy farming produces milk, butter and cheese from cows that graze in grassy fields.
sentences.chinese: 乳品業靠在牧場放牧的奶牛生產牛奶，黃油和奶酪。

sentences.english: Another dairy producer, Geng Jinpin, also received the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 另一個乳品生產商，耿金平，同樣獲判死刑。

sentences.english: It is a trade center in a farm and dairy region. Population, 46, 393.
sentences.chinese: 它是耕作和乳品業地區的貿易中心。

sentences.english: And the Pretreatment of the effluent is essential.
sentences.chinese: 乳品廠污水需要經過一定的前處理。

sentences.english: It is also common knowledge that milk containing deleterious organisms is an unsuitable article of food.
sentences.chinese: 乳品中含有有害微生物不適合食用是基本常識。

sentences.english: I would like to visit your dairy.
sentences.chinese: 我想參觀你們的乳品廠。

sentences.english: Cadbury’s Guide to Low Carbon Dairy Farming deserves recognition for two reasons.
sentences.chinese: 吉百利的低碳乳品業指南值得肯定是由於兩個原因。

sentences.english: The futures application of electronic nose in dairy industry were prospected.
sentences.chinese: 展望了電子鼻在乳品工業中的應用前景。

sentences.english: Danny has visited the dairy and he has learned how to make yohgurt.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼參觀了乳品廠，他學到了怎樣做酸奶。

sentences.english: There coexist opportunities and challenge in the development of our medium and small-sized milkings.
sentences.chinese: 我國中小乳品企業發展的機遇與挑戰並存。

sentences.english: It turns out that people who eat low-fat or fat-free dairy lose MORE weight than people who don't.
sentences.chinese: 事實證明喫低脂或無脂乳品的人羣減重比其他的多。

definition: general term for milk packaged for the consumer, including long-life (UHT) milk, pasteurized milk and reconstituted milk
